title: DHS Coimbatore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 32 Dental Surgeon and Other Posts
description: District Health Society Coimbatore (DHS Coimbatore) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 32 vacancies for Dental Surgeon, Yoga Naturopathy, Yoga Professional, Therapeutic Assistant, Dental Technician, and Other Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BDS, Post Graduation, Diploma, D.Pharm, 08th can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Coimbatore Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, appl...
